hackathon-description-text: Techweek is proud to host a 24-hour hackathon - join developers and hackers for an all-day frenzy of fun, camaraderie and coding. At the end, each team will have created an entirely new application that they will showcase to a panel of judges in the hopes of being crowned the winners!
hackathon-eligibility: Teams can consist of one but no more than five.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A cash prize of $5,000 will be given to the 1st place team.
Each member of the 2nd place team will receive a round trip plane ticket to anywhere in the continental United States.
5 Vip Passes to any future Techweek will be awarded to the team that comes in 3rd place.
The team with the best use of Zebra Technology's platform will be awarded one DJI Phantom Aerial UAV Drone Quadcopter:
The team with the best use of Corvisa's Summit Platform will be awarded $1000.
The top team on a .CO domain (TBD by the judges) will be awarded a $500 Amex Gift Card.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: You are not required to explain how your app makes money, unless that is part of the problem you solve.

hackathon-description-header: Join us at WeWork for the Techweek Chicago Hackathon
